participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Sophie is an outgoing and cheerful individual who enjoys nature and animals. She is passionate about her values, especially regarding her vegan lifestyle.
participant_1.background: i am a vegan. i will graduate from high school in two years. i like riding horses. my bedroom is purple and lime green.

participant_2.name: Lucas
participant_2.personality: Lucas is a creative and musical person who loves to express himself through his art. He is thoughtful and enjoys learning about different cultures.
participant_2.background: my father is an electrician. i play the violin and the guitar. i love chocolate bars. i speak chinese.
